channel.title: Sugar on Bao Tran Hoang
channel.description: Recent content in Sugar on Bao Tran Hoang

item.title: Sugar
item.description: Growing up in a single-parent household, I have somewhat a special emotional attachment to orphaned children. At SUGAR, I have got the chance to interact with and add values to the lives of children at shelters. Leading a network of hundreds of volunteers and enlisting support from our 33,000 followers on Facebook, Iâ€™m contented that I can help take care of them both mentally and financially. Regular trips to orphanages have brought home to me many heartful values.
